title: Cross Course Project
content: This have been worked on across the first year. It's the fist project I got tasked todo do. It have two versions, one with API and one with CMS

title: Project Exam
content: This is my first exam as a student at Noroff. I was tasked to use WP as a headless CMS, and use Netlify as the front-end for the project.

title: Semester Project
content: In the semester project, i was task to create a website for a Community science Museum to promote the opening and attract guests.
